name: Gravity Wave
text: Remove all your non-infantry units from this system and place them in any adjacent system. Then place a Gravity Rift token in this system. [Note: Infantry will not survive.]
flavorText: *Gravity twisted violently, ejecting vessels into nearby space.*

name: Vortex Wakeing
text: Destroy all non-carried fighters in this system. Then place a Vortex token in this system.
flavorText: *Space warps unnaturally. Instruments fail, and reality stutters.*

name: Tactical Clarity
text: Remove your command token from this system and gain 1 command token. Then you may perform another action.
flavorText: *In the stillness of deep space, the path ahead became undeniable.*

name: Fracture Protocol
text: You may destroy a ship in this system to place two ships of lower cost in its place.
flavorText: *The vessel split open — not in failure, but in purpose.*

name: Quantum Spoor
text: Gain 1 non-faction technology owned by at least one of your neighbors.
flavorText: *Our sensors caught the residue of something massive. We followed its path — and found data impossible to fake.*

name: Founder's Sacrifice
text: You may place a Space Dock from your reinforcements on this planet. If you do, destroy all your ground forces on the planet.
flavorText: *They did not build the dock. They became it.*
